Udu bụ aerophone dị ukwuu (na nke a implosive) na idiophone nke ndị Igbo nke Nigeria
Nke ite mmiri nwere oghere, ọ bụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị Igbo aku udu na oge mmeme
Ọ na-ewepụta ụda bass site na ịkụ nnukwu oghere nọ ya n'ahu ngwa ngwa
Enwere ọtụtụ ụzọ enwere ike igbanwe uda ya, dabere n'otú esi dose kpisiri aka dị n'elu obere oghere dị n'elu
Ọzọkwa, enwere ike iji mkpịsị aka rụọ corpus dum
Taa, ndị na-eji aka n'aku egwu na udi di iche- iche n'eji ya emeputa egwu.
Ọ bụ nkwanye ùgwù na-akpọ aha ihe ọdịnala na-enweghị nkwenye ndị obodo Igbo
